posts.title: First Entry
posts.content:
This is my first journal entry. The format is simple - just thoughts put to paper (or screen, as it were).

I find that writing helps me organize my mind. Perhaps you'll find these musings interesting, or perhaps not. Either way, they're here.

posts.title: On Beginnings
posts.content:
Every story has a beginning, even if we don't always recognize it at the time.

Looking back, I can see the threads that led me here. Small decisions, chance encounters, moments that seemed insignificant but changed everything.

What beginning am I in right now, I wonder?
